Articles.Content:
Try using this as your system to start off with in Career mode. 

  • Every planet in a highly elliptical, inclined orbit
  • Have them all be on different sides of Kerbol
  • Change moons around and planetary settings for lower gravities
  • Make them far enough apart that you really need to be planning if you want to properly intercept a world
  • Only use the first few tech tree levels (5-ish tiers)

If it's too hard or easy let me know because I want a reasonable challenge.

Thanks!

-Noah
This isn't a challenge, it is a suggestion
It's a Mission Idea, though.
